data.question: What is the title of the research article?
data.answer: Thermodynamically Guided Synthesis of Mixed-Linker Zr-MOFs with Enhanced Tunability

data.question: Who is the corresponding author of the article?
What are the names of the two mixed-linker Zr-MOFs synthesized in the study?
What is the highest TCPP molar ratio achieved in PCN-134 without generating impurity?
Is PCN-134 demonstrated to have high porosity?
Does PCN-133 exhibit excellent chemical stability in aqueous solutions across a wide pH range?
What method was used to determine the defect concentration in PCN-134?
data.answer: Analyzing the concentration of benzoate by 1H NMR

data.question: What is the role of benzoic acid in the synthesis of PCN-134?
data.answer: It acts as a modulating reagent

data.question: Can the defect density in PCN-134 be systematically controlled?
What is the main purpose of using MeLi in the defect analysis of PCN-134?
data.answer: To quantitatively react with surface hydroxyl groups and yield methane for gas chromatographic analysis

data.question: What is the highest Cr2O72- adsorption capacity demonstrated by PCN-134?
data.answer: PCN-134-22%TCPP showed the highest Cr2O72- uptake

data.question: Does the presence of disturbing ions significantly affect the Cr2O72- adsorption capacity of PCN-134-22%TCPP?
What is the photocatalytic activity of PCN-134-22%TCPP compared to TiO2 and MIL-125-NH2?
data.answer: PCN-134-22%TCPP exhibits higher photocatalytic activity than both TiO2 and MIL-125-NH2

data.question: Is the framework of PCN-134 retained after the photocatalytic reduction of Cr2O72-?
What synthetic strategy is proposed for the synthesis of mixed-linker Zr-MOFs?
What is the publication date of the research article?
Are PCN-133 and PCN-134 synthesized using a one-pot synthesis method?
What is the main advantage of the synthesized mixed-linker Zr-MOFs over traditional MOFs?
Was Sequential Linker Installation (SLI) used in the synthesis of PCN-133 and PCN-134?
What is the significance of the defect density control in PCN-134?
data.answer: It affects the MOF's properties, such as porosity and Cr2O72- adsorption capacity
